verses.verse: Hear <S%H8085><s%> this word <S%H1697><s%>, ye kine <S%H6510><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, that are in the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of Samaria <S%H8111><s%>, that oppress <S%H6231><s%> the poor <S%H1800><s%>, that crush <S%H7533><s%> the needy <S%H34><s%>, that say <S%H559><s%> unto their lords <S%H113><s%>, Bring <S%H935><s%>, and let us drink <S%H8354><s%>.

The Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%> hath sworn <S%H7650><s%> by his holiness <S%H6944><s%>, that <S%H3117><s%>, lo, the days shall come <S%H935><s%> upon you <S%H5375><s%>, that they shall take you away with hooks <S%H6793><s%>, and your residue <S%H319><s%> with fish-hooks <S%H1729><s%>.

And ye shall go out <S%H3318><s%> at the breaches <S%H6556><s%>, every <S%H802><s%> one straight before her <S%H7993><s%>; and ye shall cast yourselves into Harmon <S%H2038><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Come <S%H935><s%> to Beth-el <S%H1008><s%>, and transgress <S%H6586><s%>; to Gilgal <S%H1537><s%>, and multiply <S%H7235><s%> transgression <S%H6586><s%>; and bring <S%H935><s%> your sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> every morning <S%H1242><s%>, and your tithes <S%H4643><s%> every three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>;

and offer <S%H6999><s%> a sacrifice of thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%> of that which is leavened <S%H2557><s%>, and proclaim <S%H7121><s%> freewill-offerings <S%H5071><s%> and publish <S%H8085><s%> them <S%H3651><s%>: for this pleaseth <S%H157><s%> you <S%H1121><s%>, O ye children of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>.

And I also have given <S%H5414><s%> you cleanness <S%H5356><s%> of teeth <S%H8127><s%> in all your cities <S%H5892><s%>, and want <S%H2640><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%> in all your places <S%H4725><s%>; yet have ye not returned <S%H7725><s%> unto me <S%H5002><s%>, saith Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And I also have withholden <S%H4513><s%> the rain <S%H1653><s%> from you <S%H7969><s%>, when there were yet three months <S%H2320><s%> to the harvest <S%H7105><s%>; and I caused it to rain <S%H4305><s%> upon one <S%H259><s%> city <S%H5892><s%>, and caused it not to rain <S%H4305><s%> upon another <S%H259><s%> city <S%H5892><s%>: one <S%H259><s%> piece <S%H2513><s%> was rained <S%H4305><s%> upon <S%H2513><s%>, and the piece whereupon it rained <S%H4305><s%> not withered <S%H3001><s%>.

So two <S%H8147><s%> or three <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> wandered <S%H5128><s%> unto one <S%H259><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> to drink <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%>, and were not satisfied <S%H7646><s%>: yet have ye not returned <S%H7725><s%> unto me <S%H5002><s%>, saith Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

I have smitten <S%H5221><s%> you with blasting <S%H7711><s%> and mildew <S%H3420><s%>: the multitude <S%H7235><s%> of your gardens <S%H1593><s%> and your vineyards <S%H3754><s%> and your fig-trees <S%H2132><s%> and your olive-trees <S%H8384><s%> hath the palmer-worm <S%H1501><s%> devoured <S%H398><s%>: yet have ye not returned <S%H7725><s%> unto me <S%H5002><s%>, saith Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

I have sent <S%H7971><s%> among you the pestilence <S%H1698><s%> after the manner <S%H1870><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: your young men <S%H970><s%> have I slain <S%H2026><s%> with the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and have carried away <S%H7628><s%> your horses <S%H5483><s%>; and I have made the stench <S%H889><s%> of your camp <S%H4264><s%> to come up <S%H5927><s%> even into your nostrils <S%H639><s%>: yet have ye not returned <S%H7725><s%> unto me <S%H5002><s%>, saith Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

I have overthrown <S%H2015><s%> cities among you <S%H430><s%>, as when God overthrew <S%H4114><s%> Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and Gomorrah <S%H6017><s%>, and ye were as a brand <S%H181><s%> plucked out <S%H5337><s%> of the burning <S%H8316><s%>: yet have ye not returned <S%H7725><s%> unto me <S%H5002><s%>, saith Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Therefore thus will I do <S%H6213><s%> unto thee <S%H3478><s%>, O Israel; and because <S%H6118><s%> I will do <S%H6213><s%> this unto thee <S%H3559><s%>, prepare to meet <S%H7125><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, O Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

For <S%H3335><s%>, lo, he that formeth the mountains <S%H2022><s%>, and createth <S%H1254><s%> the wind <S%H7307><s%>, and declareth <S%H5046><s%> unto man <S%H120><s%> what is his thought <S%H7808><s%>; that maketh <S%H6213><s%> the morning <S%H7837><s%> darkness <S%H5890><s%>, and treadeth <S%H1869><s%> upon the high places <S%H1116><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>â€” Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, is his name <S%H8034><s%>.
